title: 促請美國制裁支持送中條例官員/議員請願信TEMPLATE

replies.msg:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We would like to draw your attention to the suspect case of deprivation of human right by Hong Kong Legislator xxxxxxxx.

Xxxxxxxx supported the legislation of Extradition Law in Hong Kong. The law is clearly a breach of Hong Kong’s human right, as it allows fugitives to be handed to mainland China. Hong Kong People’s freedom to speech and freedom to assembly have inevitably been curtailed by the law.

We urge you to enforce the Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act and impose sanction on xxxxx, freeze his/ her ( as well as his/ her spouse yyyyyyy and children zzzzzzz’s )assets, and ban his / her and his / her family members from entering the U.S.

We sincerely hope that you could help sanction xxxxxxxxx, whose support of the extradition law has definitely led to much worsened human rights in Hong Kong.

Yours faithfully,
Chris Wong
（on behalf of Hong Kong citizens)
